div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio xijo die mensis maij Anno
Dominj et cetera lxvijo

Quo die Willelmus alanson' adiudicatur per bonam assisam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Andree Walkar' et emendabit eidem per visum proborum hominum et quod dicta perturbacio facta
per eundem Willelmj prefato andree Inuenta fuit per dictam assisam ex precogitata malicia et
super hoc dictus andreas a me notario publico peciit publicum instrumentum coram hiis testibus videlicet
Ricardo de Kintor preposito Andrea scherar' et thoma de camera duobus balliuorum alexandro
blindsele alexandro traile et Dauid mathouson'

Item dictus andreas Walkar' dedit andream de culan Juniorem plegium legalem pro se et parte
sua tota quod Willelmus alanson' et omnes sibi in hac parte adherentes erunt indempnes aliter quam
per viam Juris

Item antedictus Willelmus alanson' dedit alexandrum traile plegium legalem quod andreas Walkar'
et omnes sibi in hac parte adherentes erunt indempnes de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam
Juris

Eodem die gilbertus de camera cepit probare legittime infra hinc et crastinum diem post festum
sancte trinitatis proximum sequens quod henricus hertwitson' debet sibi vnam barellam salmonum men
sure hamburgensis hoc facto dictus henricus satisfaciet dicto gilberto eandem barellam salmo
num in continente et ad hoc perimplendum dedit Ricardum de Kintor plegium

Item dictus gilbertus fide media obligatur ad satisfaciendum dicto henrico ad diem superius
expressatum quinquaginta quatuor solidos sibi debit' sine vlteriori dilacione

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die mensis maij anno
Domini et cetera lxvijo

Eodem die Johannes scarrate de leith' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta
detencione xxiij s' et de recessu ipsius a seruicio dicti godardi Wynniers
et satisfaciet et emendabit eidem infra terminum Juris prout Jura volunt
et de iniusta detencione ab eodem de sexdecem vacuis barellis aut de valore
earundem in pecuniis infra terminum Juris

div.head: nomina assisa
div.p:
Patricius badenach' alexander blindsele Jacobus betson' Johannes
Wormot gilbertus Waus' Johannes Waus' Duncanus allone' Dauid
mathouson' gilbertus de camera thomas broysour' et Dauid
colyson'

Assisa infrascripta penes vnam pipam vinj albi pertinentem petro gallico distructam in le keile
naue per Johannem'em' overwrites 'is'. scarret de leith' et per marinarios eiusdem ordinauit quod dampna illius pipe
debent persolui dicto petro per marinarios pro tempore existente in dicta naue le keile tam bene impositos
per dictum pertrum quod per prefatum Johannem scarret infra terminum Juris quorum nomina subscribuntur In primis
ex parte dicti petri Willelmus Dog Johannes henrison' Robertus Dog Willelmus syry alexander andir
son' Walterus andirson' scottis androw et per le franssoys et ex parte Johannis scarrat et
frater eius qui soluent partem suam illius dampni de dicta pipa vini et dictus petrus factus
fuit quitus de toto lying siluir clamato per dictum Johannem scarrate

Actio debatabilis inter henricum hertwitson' et gilbertum de camera de vna barella salmonum
petita per dictum gilbertum a dicto henrico ponitur in dilacione vsque ad aduentum dicti gilberti et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus andirson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione trium solidorum g'
et septem grossorum monete flandrie et satisfaciet a Jacobo betson' et satisfaceit eidem
infra terminum Juris hoc est xiij s' iiij d' monete scocie pro nobile

Memorandum that is it appoyntyt and accordyt betuix thomas of culan on that a part and henry
hertwitson' on that vthir' part anent the clame of ane obligacione of Johne' stewartis of
xiiij li' g' ix s' g' that is to say that the saide thomas is oblist to deliuer to the saide henry the
forsaide obligacione in abirdene at the fest of saynt michale next eftir folowande the
date of this write but ony langar' delay And gif it hapnys the forsaide thomas
to failye in the deliuerance of the saide obligacione at the day and place fornemnyt the said'
thomas and henry ar' oblist be the fathis of thair' bodijs to stande and til vndirly the
decret and ordinance and the determinacione of thir' four' personys vndirwrittyn that is
to say Richarde of Kintor mathow fechat Dauid simson' and of Robert gillespy the quhilk
sal be sworne' be the gret athe on the morne eftir michalmes day til gif it out eftir thair'
consciens as law will quhat the saide thomas sal do to the forsaide henry in faute of
deliuerans of the saide obligacione And gif it sal happin ony of the forsade four' perso
nys to be nocht present at the saide day / the saide henry sal ches' sic a like persone' induellar'
in the saide tone' in his stede / And the saide thomas is oblist be the fathe of his body
to fulfill thair' decret within acht dayis eftir thair' deliuerance / but ony langar' delay
And gif ony of the fornemnyt parteis absentis thaim or thair' procuratoris fra the saide day
the party comperande askande the decret of the forsaide personys sal hafe deliuerans tharof
as it is befor' writtyn thes act' of poyntment and accordans made in the tolbuth' the
xxiiij day of maij the yer' of our' lorde et cetera lxvij yeris befor' thir' witnes /
Johne' of marr' patrik of badenach' maystir' henry Kymdy Androw scherar'
William blyndsele Jamys betson' alexander traile malcolme of forbes and William
of Kintor with' vthir' sindry

the last day of september' comperit in the tolbuth' the parteis befor' writtyn that is to say henry
hertwitson' and thomas of culan and in thair' presens befor' a bailye alexander meignes the said'
arbitrouris Richard' of Kyntor mathou fechat Dauid symson' and robert gillespy ar sworne
be the gret athe eftir the tenour' of this act to deliuer the said' mater and caus' as law will'
eftir thair' consciens and the said' day the said' arbitrouris has continuit the said' actione to the
self viij dayis with the consent of bath' the parteis forsaid' with continuacione of dayis
and houris

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die
mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera lxvijo

Quo die fergusius chapman sepe vocatus ad sectam Willelmi Kintor pro iniusta
detencione ab eodem de computo et solucione restan' de xxxvj s' g' non comparuit
quare precipitur seriando et cetera tanquam primo die huius processus

Idem fergusius sepe vocatus ad sectam Dauid hill' pro iniusta detencione vnius
barelle salmonum mensure hamburgensis vel de valore xvij s' g' ad bonum
computum pro eadem barella non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus

Johannes thomas de marr' filius bet sepe vocatus ad intrandum Johannem de mar' fratrem suum ad sectam alexandri traile pro iniusta
detencione quinquaginta s' pro quibus traxit ipsum alexandrum in plegium pro
diuersis mercimoniis receptis a Ranaldo tailyour' non comparuit tanquam primo die
huius processus

Johannes hall' dictus sardar' sepe vocatus ad sectam mathei coupar pro iniusta
detencione vnius annuli aurei non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus

Quo die thomas blindsele fatebatur se debere patricio andree vnam barellam
salmonum cum dimidio mensure hamburgensis et ad satisfaciendum eidem infra terminum
Juris et penes vnam aliam barellam per ipsum negatam dedit Willelmj Willelmum blindsele
plegium ad comparendum proximo die siue curia legali ad instanciam ipsius
patricij responsurum

Richt honorable' and Richt worschipfull seris and wele beluwyt nichtburis we commawnde
ws hartly to yow and pleysith yow to wit that we hafe rassauyt and vndirstandin your'
lettres sende til ws and present be the berar' making mensione' that thar' is a question' hapnyt
with' yow that a burges of your' burgh' the quhilk is decessit hapinyt to mary twa
wyffis and in the fyrst wyffis tym conquest a lande within your' saide burgh' and hade
with' hir' a douchtir and eftir the fyrst wyffis decess' he hapnyt to mary ane vthir
wyf with' the quhilk he gat sonnys and dochtiris the quhilke lande conquest in the
fyrst wyffis tym was vnassignyt be him til ony of his saide barnys in his tym'
and at thar is now cummyn befor' yow the dochtir of the fyrst wyf clamande the saide
lande as air' tharto and to be knawin be yow to the samyn and richt swa the son' of the
secunde wyf askande him to be kende to the saide lande as air' til his fadir' praying
ws that forsamekle' as sic a cas' is nocht hapnyt with' yow in tym bigane that
we walde pas' togiddir with' the consaile of men of law and avise tharapon' and to cer
tyfy yow in write with' the berar' ffor the quhilkis we hafe passit togiddir with'
men of law and has commonyt apon' the saide matir beande wele and rypely avisit
thus we mak knawin and findis that the douchtir gottyn in the fyrst wyffis tyme
aucht of Reson' and law to succede to the heritage conquest and gottyn in the saide
fyrst wyffis tym of less' than it was assignit of befor' in the fadir' tym vt patet in
legibus burgorum In capitulo vbi dicit de homine habente duas vxores et cetera And this
we declar' and certyfijs to your' nichtbourhedis be thir presentis the quhilkis the
blessit trinite euirmar' conserue in gud hele and prosperite writtyn vndir our' common
sele of caus' at Edinburgh' the xx day of the moneth' of marche /
prepositus balliui et consules burgi de Edinburgh'
vobis prompti in omnibus
honorabilibus circumspecteque prudencie viris preposito balliuis et
consulibus ville de Abirdene vicinis et amicis nostris sincere
dilectis

Richt honorable' and worschipfull seris and richt hartly louyt nichtburis we commaunde
ws hartly to yow and for alsmekle' as we hafe vndirstandin your' lettres sende til ws
of a questione' fallin amangis yow be the decess' of ane of your' nichtburis the quhilk
maryit twa wyffis and hade with' the fyrst wyf a dochtir in the quhilk wyffis tym
he conquest a lande within your' saide burgh' and eftir' hir' decess' maryit ane vthir'
wyf with' the quhilkis he gat sonnys and dochtiris til inquer' of the successione' of the
saide lande conquest in the saide fyrst wyffis tym quhilk of the barnys succede
to the saide lande we Ripely avisit of befor' be ane of our' nichtburis decessyt
fande and declarit that quhar' he hade with' the fyrst wyf douchtiris and
with' the secunde a son' that the lande conquest in the fyrst wyffis tym the dochtir
is full air' and nocht the son' eftir the law and consuet of the burgh' and this
to your' hartly nichtburhedis we declar' be thir' our' lettres the quhilkis almichty
god hafe euir in his blessit keping writtyn and closit vndir' our' secret sele at perth
the xx day of marche the yer' of our' lorde a thousande hundre sexty
and sex yeris
prepositus balliui et consules burgi
de perth vestri ad mandatum
Honorabilibus et magne prudencie viris preposito balliuis
et consulibus burgi de Abirdene vicinis nostris sincere
dilectis

Richt honorable' and worschipfull seris ande nichtburis hartly louyt we commande
ws to yow with' al our' hartis and pleys' your' nichtburhedis to wit that we hafe
vndirstandyn your' letter direct til ws vndir your' secret sele raquerying ws to certyfy
yow be writ this question' a man maryande twa wyffis with' the fyrst wyf he conquest
landis and hade a douchtir with' that wyf / and eftir that wyffis decess' maryit ane
vthir' wyf with the quhilk he gatt sonnys and dochteris the man deande and makande na
assignacione of his landis til nane of his barnys // the law and consuetude of the four'
burowys in the xxv chapter that begynnis thus conatis Si burgensis duas vxores habuerit
et cetera declaris that the landis conquest in the last wyffis tym will ramayn with the last
wyffis barnys the quhilk law we oys' and kepis and we consaile yow to do richt
swa nocht ellis bot richt honorable' and worschipfull nichtburis the haly gast conserue yow
in prosperite euirlestingly bath' in bodijs and saulys writtyn vndir our' secret sele at Dunde the
xxvij day of the moneth' of marche
prepositus balliui et consules burgi de Dunde vobis paratj
Honorabilibus et circumspectis prudencie viris preposito balliuis
et consulibus burgi de Abirdene vicinis nostris predilectis

Curia legalis balliuorum huius burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto die mensis
Junij anno Domini et cetera lxvijmo

Eodem die Johannes sardar' sepe vocatus ad sectam mathej coupar vt supra non
comparuit tanquam tercio die huius processus

Willelmus blindsele sepe vocatus ad intrare faciendum thomam bindsele ad sectam
patricij andirson' non intrauit eundem tanquam primo die huius processus

Willelmus andirson super quem Willelmus vokat porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
computi vnius barelle salmonum mensure hamburgensis et nouem eorum de quibus ipse fuit /
sibi mercator in normundy et solucione eiusdem non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus

Vicesimo secundo die mensis Junij anno Domini quo supra agnes sponsa thome litstar'
cepit probare sufficienter quod Johannes filius Willelmi commoratis in ballindene' cepit ad firmam
vnum bouem a dicta agnete hodie ad quidenam quindenam coram preposito et balliuis dicti burgi hoc
facto dictus Johannes satisfaciet dicte agneti dictum bouem cum firma eiusdem infra
terminum Juris plegius andreas rede de badfothale

Et predictus andreas rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Ewmundus mortimar' de
cragyweir' ministrabit iusticiam agneti sponse thome litstar' de Donaldo scot
viro suo de clameo vnius vacce cum proficuo eiusdem de sex annis preteritis infra
vicesimum diem proximum a data presentis scripti sequentis sine fraude

Eodem die Ricardus de Kintor prepositus huius burgi protestabatur nomine communitatis
quod protestacio facta per magistrum fratrem patricij pyot magistrum hospitalis sancti
germani cum stellam ordinis sancti augustini non preiudicaret domino nostro Regi nec /
libertati huius burgi in futurum /

Item it is giffin to Johne' henryson' the pynour' to finde the man that he come
borch for to ser Ingrame' banerman for' xxxij thraw of thak hathir' to saint
clementis kirke within iij oukis her'eftir to fre him it forsfytt and gif he findis
hym nocht he sal content and pay to the said' ser Ingram for' the hathir' and his
clerk fee within viij dayis thar' eftir xxxij d' but ony langar delay

thomas de marr' sepe vocatus ad intrandum Johannem de marr' fratrem suum ad sectam alexandri
traile vt supra non intrauit eundem tanquam secundo h die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando

Item eodem die Johannes andirson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
mariote serui thome andirson' et emendabit eedem per visum proborum eciam adiudicatur
per assisam de fractione plegiorum legiorum inter ipsum et dictam mariotam capta per officiarios
huius burgi /

Vicesimo quinto die mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera Johannes Duncanson' dedit
Willelmj Willelmum de Kintor plegium legalem pro se et parte sua tota quod alexander nachty
et omnes sibi adherentes erunt indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die alexander nachty dedit Dauid mathowson' plegium legalem quod dictus
Johannes Duncanson' et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se et parte sua
tota aliter quam per viam Juris

The samyn day symon of craufurde oftymis callit to comper' til ansuer' til a borch'
of pypowdrous' strekit be Dauy hervy for the wrangwis' with'halding'ing' overwrites 'is'. of the
ferde part of xxxiiij crownys aucht be saide symon for wast fracht of a quartar
of the balingar' as he that as awynar' of a quartar of the said' balingar' that the
said symon was oblist to lade out of normundy the last rays' scho was thar' nocht
comperyt as the fyrst day of process' of thre tydis

The clame of a some contenyt in a bill clamyt be thome' of culan apon' thome traile
was put to the declaracione of thome trailis ath' the quhilk ath' the saide thome trayle
has made apon' the trinite tystir' in presens of the aldirman and bailyeis sittande in Juge
ment throw the quhilkis the saide thome trayle is quyt of al clamys of the said thome'
of culan now and for' euir' and the said thome of culan sal ansuer' til the saide thome'
traile the next lachfull day til a borch' strekit apon' him for the wrangwis' with'
halding fra him of gud compt and reknyng of xij hidis and a half /

vicesimo sexto die mensis Junij anno Dominj et cetera lxvijo symon craufurde sepe vocatus ad sectam
Dauid hervy ad plegium de le pipowdrous porrectum per ipsum super dicto simone non comparuit
tanquam secundo refluxu maris sine processus et non precipitur seriando ad premuniendum eundem ad comparendum
et cetera

The borch' of pipowdrous' strekit be Dauy hervy apon' sym of craufurde is continuit to
twysday next to cum with the consent of bath' the parteis in sic lik ply as it standis now in
but preiudicie of ony of the parteis

Vltimo die mensis Junij anno Domini quo supra actio mota Dauid hervy et symonem de
craufurde continuatur vsque ad diem lune proximum sequens cum consensu parcium sine preiudicio alicuius
partis in eodem statie quo nunc est

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio huius burgi sexto die mensis Julij anno Dominj
et cetera lxvijoquo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata /

Quo die gilbertus de camera super quem alexander blindsele porrexit plegium pro
iniusta detencione nouem mercarum pro dimidia parte de le keile sepe vocatus non comparuit tanquam
primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera et prefatus alexander protestabatur
quod exquo prefatus gilbertus non wlt sibi prebere auxilium ad edificacionem sue partis de le
keile pro dampna que patitur in defectu ipsius refunderetur per eundem prefato alexandro /

Eodem die Johannes colyson' et Jacobus de Kinquorth' super quem Andreas Rede
nomine tocius de le kawill de furdis complicium ipsius quod ipsi piscauerunt aquam nostram
extra prohibicionem seruorum et interfecierunt quatuor salmones et quinque le grils' et iniuste
recesserunt cum ipsis sepe vocatus tanquam primo die huius processus non comparuerunt et ideo

thomas quelp super quem Johannes sprunt porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem de septem solidis grossorum monete flandrie sepe vocatus tanquam primo die
huius processus non comparuit et ideo precipitur seriando

Willelmus andirson' sepe vocatus ad sectam Willelmi vokate tanquam secundo die huius processus
non comparuit et cetera

Johannes Robertson dictus thrift super quem Robertus blindsele porrexit plegium
pro iniusta spoliacione de certis tabulis' de warstale in botha sua sepe vocatus tanquam
primo die huius processus non comparuit et ideo precipitur seriando / et pro iniusta abstractione vnius
ligne precis x s' de dicta botha et pro firma bothe predicte xij d'

xmo die mensis Julij anno quo supra gilbertus moryson' cepit probare coram balliuis
die lune proxima et immediate sequente quod Duncanus allone' habet duas mensuras
salis sibi pertinentes hoc facto dictus Duncanus deliberabit illas duas mensuras salis
sibi et deficien' de sua probacione dicto die dictus Duncanus erit quitus de suo
clameo /

Willelmus blindsele sepe vocatus ad intrandum thomam blindsele et sectam patricij andirson'
vt supra non intrauit eundem tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando /

Eodem die thomas de culan super quem thomas traile porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem de computo et plena solucione xij coriorum cum dimidio cum quibus se intromisit tanquam dicto thome
traile factore' in flandria sepe vocatus non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando
et cetera

Vicesimo Decimo quinto die mensis Julij Anno Domini et cetera lxvijo Jacobus law per confessionem
propriam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione thome quhite et emendet sibi per visum
proborum hominum eciam publice fatebatur se fecisse illam perturbacionem ex precogitata ma
licia prefato thome /

Eodem die thomas quhite accusatus de iniusta perturbacione serui sui factus fuit
quitus de omni perturbacione dicti serui sui et filij prefati Jacobi law /

Eodem die thomas de marr' sepe vocatus ad intrare faciendum Johannem de marr' fratrem suum
ad sectam alexandri traile vt supra non intrauit eundem tanquam tercio die huius processus et ideo precipitur
seriando et cetera

Johannes nory super quem Johannes moyses porrexit plegium pro iniusta perturbacione
detencione vnius barelle salmonum mensure hamburgensis pro qua deuenit sibi
debitorem pro gilberto Waus' sepe vocatus non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus
et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Vicesimo tercio die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra Walterus striueling burgensis dicti burgi
comparuit in pretorio coram Johanne de Kintor vno balliuorum dicti burgi non vi aut metu ductus
nec herrore lapsus sed sua mera et spontanea voluntate ac preposito motu per tradicionem vnius straminis
in manibus dicti balliui omne Jus et clameum Juris que habet habuit aut habere poterit in vel ad quandam
terram cum pertinenciis Jacente ex posteriori parte botharum inter terram Johannis nory ex australi parte et terram
Johannis tailyour' ex parte boriali ac communem venellam versus occidens et terram dicti balliui
versus oriens sursum reddidit pureque et simpliciter resignauit ad vsum et commodum alexandri de haya
burgensis dicti burgi coram hiis testibus Willelmo de haya Waltero murison' alexandro traile gilberto
moryson' andrea de rattre Johanne skynnar' Johanne galt Johanne de tulydef et laurencio
thomson duobus seriandorum dicti burgi cum diuersis alijs

xxvijo die thomas curteoch' ex fauore consilij et ad instanciam magistri Ricardi
de forbes decani abbirdonensis receptus fuit in liberum burgensis et confratrem gilde huius
burgi qui soluet xl s' preposito et prestitit solitum Juramentum et plegius pro eo
Walterus blindsele et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio huius burgi vicesimo die mensis
Julij Anno Domini et cetera lxvijo

Eodem die Johannes nory sepe vocatus ad sectam Johannis moyses vt supra
non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Thomas de culan sepe vocatus ad sectam thome traile vt supra non comparuit
tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur et cetera

Willelmus andirson' sepe vocatus ad sectam Willelmi vokat vt supra non comparuit
tanquam tercio die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Andreas de balhvny adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Johannis gowine et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

Johannis gowine adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione andree
balhowny et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

gilbertus de camera sepe vocatus ad sectam alexandri blindsele vt supra non
comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

thomas quelp sepe vocatus ad sectam Johannis sprunt vt supra non comparuit
tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Jacobus de Kinquorth' et Johannes colyson' sepe vocati ad sectam Andree
Rede nomine tocius le cawile vt supra non comparuerunt tanquam seucndo die huius processus
et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Nicholauis thekar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi et
emendabit parti lese per visum proborum /

The samyn penult day of Julij the saide Johne' of ruthirfurde in presens of the saide
aldirman and bailyeis made constitut and ordanit his derrast eme henry of ruthirfurde his
curate and attornay til se to the vphalde of his saide lande and tenement and the malis to be
disponyt apon' it and to ressaue all vthir malis and annualis belangande him and namely his an
nuale of the Watirton' til his cummyn hame and than to mak him compt thar of /

Eodem die alexander traile deuenit ad suum clameum super thoma de marr' de lta s' quia
non intrauit Johannem de marr' fratrem suum pro quo deuenit plegius ad intrandum eundem
pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de quinquaginta solidis'is' overwrites 'orum'. predictis qua summa extraxit ipsum
alexandrum in plegium Ranaldo tailyour' pro diuersis mercimoniis a dicto ranaldo emptis et
receptis et optinuit prefatam summam per legitimos Juris processus per ipsum duct' causa non defensa
et ad satisfaciendum prefato alexandro infra terminum Juris et hoc datum est pro iudicio per os Willelmi
scherreff Judicatoris curie // Quare prefatus thomas adiudicatur in quatuor amerciamentis causa
absencie sine ab ista curia et tribus curiis precedentibus .

xxiiijto die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra Dauid meignes sepe vocatus ad intrandum
seipsum ad respondendum plegio porrecto per Dauid her'on nomine et ex parte Dauid Wormot
secundum tenorem eiusdem plegij non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando ad
summoniendum dictum Dauid ad proximam tan curiam tanquam secundo die huius processus

xxvijmo die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra Willelmus maliceson' publice fatebatur in pretorio
coram preposito et aliis diuersis se debere Willelmo gray vicino suo xiiijor marcas vsualis
monete scocie /

Eodem die assisa ordinauit Jacobum andirson' ad satisfaciendum domino andree henrison'
capellano xlta s' ad festum sancti michaelis archangeli proximum futurum sine vlteriori dilacione
et ad hoc perimplendum fide media obligatur prefato domino andree pro Jocale sibi inpignerato per dictum
Jacobum pro summa predicta et ad conseruandum ipsum dominum andream indempnem ab omni clameo dicti Jocalis in futurum

xxviijo die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra prepositus et balliui et maior pars consilij ordinarunt Willelmj Willelmum
maliceson' ad satisfaciendum Willelmo gray infra quindenam ab hinc xiiijcem marcas sibi debitas pro bonis
suis receptis per Walterum spens de leith' nomine et ex parte ipsius Willelmi maliceson' per vno vocato Irnsyde
replegiat' per ipsum Walterum cum commissione quam sibi deliberauit prefatus Willelmus maliceson' /

Penultimo die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra Johannes mathouson' dedit Dauid mathouson'
plegium legalem quod Johannes glenmalyn erit indempnis de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam
Juris

Eodem modo Johannes glenmalyne dedit alexandrum howyson' plegium legalem pro Johannes
mathouson' erit indempnis de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris et dictus Johannes
glenmalyn adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Johannis mathouson'
et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt /

The samyn day In presens of the aldirman and bailyeis settande in Jugement Johne'
of ruthirfurde the son' and air' of vmquhile Androw of ruthirfurde grauntyt that he
had' set al and hale his tenement with the pertinens lyande in the galowgat on the
est syde of that ilke betuix the land' of Richarde of Kintor on the north' syde
and the lande of androw alanson' on the suthe syde til margaret meignes his modir
for the termys of iij yeris fullely to be compleit and runnyn for xl s' yerely and hir' entre
to be in the said' tenement at the fest of Witsonday next eftir folowande the date of
this write scho payand' the annualis of the saide lande yerely and til hym in hande
xl s' of the first yeris male and with' the lafe of the malys til vphalde the lande
and gif he ramaynit langar' out of the cuntrey scho til hafe the land' of the samyn
price vphaldande the lande with' the male be sicht of frendis to the quhilkis he
purchest richarde of Kintoris sele to be to put til hir' asencione
